titleStmt.title: A doctor in physick, (twenty years since fellow of Kings Colledg in Cambridg) in Salisbury Court in Fleet-Street, at the Golden-Ball below the Ship-Tavern, hath with his long experience attained to the speediest and easiest ways of cure of the running of the reins ...
titleStmt.author: Gray, Edmund, b. 1632 or 3.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
